snippet: McDonald’s, the world’s biggest restaurant chain by revenue, posted a smaller-than-expected drop in worldwide sales at established restaurants in May.
abstract: McDonald's reports global sales dropped 0.3 percent in May in restaurants that have been open at least 13 months, smaller-than-expected drop that nevertheless makes full year of monthly declines.
lead_paragraph: McDonald’s, the world’s biggest restaurant chain by revenue, posted a smaller-than-expected drop in worldwide sales at established restaurants in May.

headline.main: Falloff for McDonald’s in U.S. Is Offset by Better Sales Abroad
headline.print_headline: Falloff For McDonald’s in U.S. Is Offset by Better Sales Abroad
